canStart() - Method in class com.game.battleship.controller.Controller.AppController
Checks if the player is able to start the game
changeToActiveGameState() - Method in class com.game.battleship.GUI.ClickableGridGUI
The function changes the game state to active game state meaning the player can't place anymore ships, and can attack the enemy grid.
changeToStartGameState() - Method in class com.game.battleship.GUI.ClickableGridGUI
Changes the game state to start state, reseting all data for AI and for the player.
checkIfAIWin() - Method in class com.game.battleship.controller.Controller.AppController
Checks if the player has won the game
checkIfallUsed() - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Checks if all the possible number of ships that can be inserted into the grid are inserted
checkIfHit(int, int) - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Checks if on the given coordinates there is a ship
checkIfKill(int, int) - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Checks if on the given coordinates there is a ship which has 0 health and destroyed is false
checkIfOverlap(Ship) - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Checks if the given ship overlaps a another one in the repository
checkIfPlayerWin() - Method in class com.game.battleship.controller.Controller.AppController
Checks if the player has won the game
checkIfSunked(int, int) - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Checks if on the given coordinates there is a ship which has 0 health
clear() - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.HitRepository.HitRepository
Clears the repository from all the hits
clear() - Method in class com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository.ShipRepository
Removes all elements from the repository and set the number for the types to initial value
clearAll() - Method in class com.game.battleship.controller.Controller.AppController
Clears all the directories, repositories of data
ClickableGridGUI - Class in com.game.battleship.GUI
A clickble GUI where there are two N x M sized grids, N and M are integers larger than zero and a button the handle the start and restart of the program.
ClickableGridGUI(int, int, AppController, AIController) - Constructor for class com.game.battleship.GUI.ClickableGridGUI
The constructor for the grid.
ClickableGridGUI(AppController, AIController) - Constructor for class com.game.battleship.GUI.ClickableGridGUI
Constructor for the GUI
com.game.battleship - package com.game.battleship
Main package for the Battleship game program.
com.game.battleship.controller.aicontroller - package com.game.battleship.controller.aicontroller
The package contains the controller for the Artificial Intelligence.
com.game.battleship.controller.Controller - package com.game.battleship.controller.Controller
This package contains the application controller which handles the input and produces a response to the UI
com.game.battleship.controller.Validators - package com.game.battleship.controller.Validators
The package contains the classes which evaluate the correctness of the user input, and make a response accordingly
com.game.battleship.domain.HitRepository - package com.game.battleship.domain.HitRepository
The package contains the repository for the Hit object, it manages their storage, and can handle additional queries.
com.game.battleship.domain.Models - package com.game.battleship.domain.Models
The package contains the models used in the program, the Ship object and the Hit object
com.game.battleship.domain.MySwingElements - package com.game.battleship.domain.MySwingElements
The package contains the "building blocks" used in the UI, the event handlers, and the buttons of the grid
com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository - package com.game.battleship.domain.ShipRepository
The package contains the repository for the Ship object, it manages their storage, and can handle additional queries, regarding overlap or state of a ship
com.game.battleship.GUI - package com.game.battleship.GUI
The package contains the UI, which handles communication between the user and the program
com.game.battleship.MyExceptions - package com.game.battleship.MyExceptions
The package provides custom exceptions for handling cases where it is necessary
com.game.battleship.Tests - package com.game.battleship.Tests
For testing functionalities
ControllerException - Exception in com.game.battleship.MyExceptions
Exception for the controller layer
ControllerException(String) - Constructor for exception com.game.battleship.MyExceptions.ControllerException
